ch0099_00_jun/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You kept me waiting long enough!
Let’s hurry up and head out on an adventure!
ch0099_00_jun/0101_0701_02_10:
You want to have a Pokémon battle, too, right?
I’m fining you a million if you’re late!
ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_01_10:
My dad is Palmer, the Battle Frontier’s
Tower Tycoon! He’s so awesomely cool!
ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_02_10: I want to be a cool, tough Trainer like my dad.
ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_03_10:
Then I’ll be able to have Pokémon battles with
lots of other tough Trainers!
ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_04_10:
That’s why there’s no time to lose!
I’ve gotta get to work!
ch0099_00_jun/0601_0702_01_10:
You’ll see! I’m gonna be a cool Trainer just like
my dad!
ch0099_00_jun/0601_0702_02_10:
That’s why I’m making sure not to slack off on
my training or whatever.
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_01_10: Piplup really has a lot of pride.
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_02_10:
When I was just starting out as a Trainer,
he didn’t listen to me at all!
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_03_10:
But now my relationship with Piplup is
totally different!
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_04_10:
Piplup is my reliable ace in the hole now!
Makes me wanna puff out my chest with pride!
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_01_10: When Piplup started listening to what I said...
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_02_10:
I was so happy that he had finally
accepted me as a Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_03_10:
That’s why I decided to get even
tougher—for Piplup!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_01_10: Hey, I’ve been on an adventure with Staraptor!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_02_10:
When I got on his back, he took off and
started flying around super fast!
I was holding on for dear life!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_03_10:
But the scenery you can see when you’re flying
through the air is incredibly beautiful!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_04_10:
Don’t you wanna try to ride him once?
If you get scared and cry, I’ll fine you!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_01_10:
Staraptor is so cool! You can fly anywhere with
him straightaway thanks to his Fly move!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_02_10:
But I’m trying to walk more and not fly
everywhere. Physical health is the
foundation of any tough Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_03_10:
Don’t get the wrong idea!
It’s not because I’m scared or anything!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_01_10:
I smack right into people a lot when I run.
Like...thud!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_02_10:
So I’m trying to think up a way of running
where I won’t bump into people so much,
but it’s pretty hard!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_03_10:
I mean, I guess I could just walk,
but it’s so slow!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_04_10:
I run because I wanna hurry up and get to
where I’m going!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_01_10:
I wanna get tougher and tougher.
There are still so many things I wanna do!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_02_10:
That’s why I’ve got no time to sit around
taking it easy!
ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_03_10:
But between you and me, sometimes going
around the long way can turn out to be
a shortcut.
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], is there
anyone you look up to?
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_02_10:
Of course I have someone I look up to—my dad,
the Frontier Brain Tower Tycoon!
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_03_10:
The Tower Tycoon is the toughest Trainer at a
facility called the Battle Tower, you know.
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_04_10:
If you don’t win a ton of Pokémon battles,
you can’t even battle him!
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_05_10:
I want to be cool like my dad! That’s the reason
I decided to become a Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_01_10:
Of course I want to beat my dad in a
Pokémon battle.
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_02_10:
Winning alone won’t make me into a cool
Trainer like my dad, though.
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_03_10:
Hmm, what should I do? I guess I’ve still got a
long way to go, huh?
ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_04_10:
I will do it, though!
Try to keep up, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0099_00_jun/1701_0701_02_10:
I’ve already got one. One what?
This item, of course!
ch0099_00_jun/1701_0702_01_10: I could learn a lot from the way you use items.
ch0099_00_jun/1701_0702_02_10: So if I find another good item, I’ll give it to you!
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a friend from Twinleaf Town just like me
who’s amazingly tough in Pokémon battles!
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_02_10: Battling with you makes me think of that kid.
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_03_10: It makes me wanna win even more!
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_04_10:
Let’s go together someday. Then we can have a
battle with my old friend!
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_01_10:
When you’ve got a really tough Trainer by
your side, it gives you confidence!
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_02_10:
You can’t have a Pokémon battle by yourself,
so there’s no point in getting tougher if you’re
all alone.
ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_03_10:
When you have an opponent who wants to get
tougher and battle against you, it makes you so
amazingly happy!
ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are hard. When you get your
directions wrong, you can lose just like that!
ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_02_10:
When Pokémon are tough, you can be sure they
have a Trainer they can count on.
ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m doing my best to keep my precious Pokémon
from getting hurt in battle.
ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_04_10:
I think it’s because I’ve been trying so hard that
my Pokémon grew to like me.
ch0099_00_jun/2511_0702_01_10:
There are some things Pokémon can’t do
and some things Trainers can’t do.
ch0099_00_jun/2511_0702_02_10:
If each of them focuses on getting better at the
things they can do, they make the toughest team!
ch0099_00_jun/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You slept in, huh?
I’ve been awake since yesterday!
ch0099_00_jun/3002_0701_01_10:
I try to take after my master and wake up early!
Come to think of it, though,
I’m not even sure if he does wake up early...
ch0099_00_jun/3003_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Starting to feel a little sleepy.
But I gotta keep going full steam ahead!
ch0099_00_jun/3004_0701_01_10:
I’m definitely prepared for some battling today!
There’s no way I’ll forget anything this time.
ch0099_00_jun/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening!
You’d think I’d be tired now, but I’m still wired!
ch0099_00_jun/3006_0701_01_10:
Time for my secret night training! 
Wait, if you’ve found me, 
it’s not secret anymore!
